item.title: Checkinstall as Bisect Helper
item.description: Checkinstall as Bisect Helper a.k.a grml get those bisect bits where I want them Background on Bisecting If you try to hunt down a particular change that introduced an issue to debug it that fixed an issue to backport it then bisecting is one of the most common tools to get it done. And it generally works great as long as you can do a cycle like the following locally:
